headline: Jefferies Downgrades The Trade Desk (TTD) on Revenue Slowdown and Competition Concerns
summary: The Trade Desk, Inc. (NASDAQ:TTD) is one of the best falling stocks to buy now. On August 11, Jefferies downgraded The Trade Desk shares from a “Buy” rating to “Hold” and cut its price target from $95 to $50. Jefferies cited a sharper-than-expected slowdown in revenue growth. On August 7, The Trade Desk reported its […]

headline: Trade Desk: 39% Crash Just Created The Most Asymmetric Opportunity In AdTech
summary: Trade Desk's 39% post-earnings selloff is a market overreaction, creating a highly attractive risk/reward entry point. See why I'm bullish about TTD stock.

headline: Large-Cap Left Behinds
summary: While major US stock market indices are back to new highs and the bull market continues on, there are some well-known large-cap stocks that have been just plain bad recently.
